content: > **current promotions** > > purchase 3 patterns and receive **10% off** > > purchase 6 patterns and receive **15% off** > > purchase 10 patterns or more and receive **20% off** **details** the pattern consists of 27 rounds crochet skill level is intermediate you will need to work back and front post stitches two stitches together and clones knots all abbreviations special stitches and techniques are explained in detail your gauge will determine things like hook size yardage finished size and height of stitches any of these things can be adjusted as needed using recommended thread and hook this pattern will use minimum 230 yards / 210 meters of thread and your finished doily will be about 12 5 / 31 cm in diameter **languages** download includes pdf file in english **community** join our discussion and support group for designs by nelly klos on facebook 1 1 https //www facebook com/groups/nk crochet designs/
